thread.title: Centerra Gold appoints former AuRico head as CEO

title: Centerra Gold appoints former AuRico head as CEO
text:
Published By: Reuters - Company News - Today 
Oct 13 (Reuters) - Canadian gold miner Centerra Gold Inc said former AuRico Gold Inc Chief Executive Scott Perry would replace Ian Atkinson ...
